question: Which Indian state topped the 'Export Preparedness Index (EPI) 2020' released by NITI Aayog?
explanation:
The NITI Aayog has recently released a report on Export Preparedness Index 2020, in partnership with the Institute of Competitiveness. It ranked states on four key parameters namely Policy, Business Ecosystem, Export Ecosystem and Export Performance.
As per the report, Gujarat has topped the index, followed by Maharashtra and Tamil Nadu. Among the top ten places of the list, six out of the countryâ€™s coastal states found place. Rajasthan topped among the landlocked states and Uttarakhand topped among the Himalayan states.
